page.title: 06Before and after school.
page.content: I wake up at 7o'clock in the morning. I get changed and go downstairs.I blow the husk's off of my budgerigars food, and give him fresh water.Then I let him out so that he can exercise himself. I read till Mum calls for breakfast.I open the cupboard and get down the cereal,Crunchy Nut Cornflakes.Then I have some toast and marmalade,and I get ready to go to school.So I get home and go straight into the living room,to let my budgerigar out for his exercise.I put him back in his cage and I take him and his cage outside and hang the cage on the apple tree.
